Text: Thanks - My girl is from Essex so it's much appreciated by her (and explains a lot for me...)

Hi can someone help explain how to download webrips, normally i just click 'get this torrent' and it starts to download, but with these it pops up with a box asking to run/save..  its a bit confusing..

Hi Lisa, that is very odd! I have never heard of this issue before. Please email me at garybradbury2012@gmail.com and I will try to help you out with a couple of other tricks.

According to Shazam the song is "Whistle" by "Flo Rida". Ironic! The whistling song is called "Whistle"!!
